title: 5 KDP Puzzle Book Niches You Can Make With AI (FREE TEMPLATES)

tactics.name: pocket-size word searches
tactics.description: Smaller dimension puzzle books designed for portability with lower printing costs
steps: Export pages and answer keys to Canva
caveats: Requires manual formatting for print-ready files
source_quotes: These are word search books that have smaller dimensions... fit in your pocket

tactics.name: jumbo print word searches
tactics.description: Large print puzzle books targeting niche markets with lower competition
steps: Focus on 'jumbo print' keyword instead of 'large print'
Optimize for readability in large formats
caveats: Higher production costs may impact margins
source_quotes: jumbo print is used slightly less than large print... making over $200 a day

tactics.name: AI-Generated Puzzle Book
tactics.description: Combine AI-generated word searches and coloring pages into a single activity book for seniors or kids.
steps: Use Lip Pal AI to generate coloring pages and word searches
Create a Canva template for book formatting
caveats: AI-generated content may lack engagement without human editing
source_quotes: This self-publisher making over $13 a day from their book.

heuristics.name: future-themed niches
heuristics.condition: If niche is tied to a future date (e.g. 2026), prioritize early entry
source_quotes: 2026 word searches... already making $55 a day... get ahead of the competition

heuristics.name: Low-Competition Niche Targeting
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts but high BSR potential, prioritize it
source_quotes: This is actually an undertapped niche on KDP.

claims.statement: Pocket-sized word search niche has low competition and high demand
source_quotes: Kipc Scout has rated this niche as profitable... very low competition

claims.statement: Memory activity books for seniors show consistent royalty earnings
